mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.strategy_id, a.strategy_version, a.action, a.test_time, a.exchange_name, a.symbol, a.revenue, a.start_time, a.end_time, a.user_id, b.version FROM test_history a JOIN strategy b on a.strategy_id = b.id WHERE 1=1 AND a.strategy_id = #{strategyId} ORDER BY a.test_time desc LIMIT 10
